title: Bilingual Call Center Representative
description:
Job Summary

The position is responsible for providing excellent and efficient quality service in inbound calls from Customers/Businesses that own a vehicle through Nissan Motor Acceptance Corporation (NMAC) or Infiniti Financial Services (IFS) in regards to any inquiry, complaint, and/or question they have regarding their loan and/or lease accounts (Including technical Support assistance to the NMAC/IFS Website). Also providing such service to NMAC/IFS Dealerships, Insurance Companies, and/or 3rd Parties (i.e. Other Financial Institutions) inquiring on subjects like Payoffs, Total Loss, Vehicle Damage, Titles, and others. The majority of the calls are in English but there might be a few calls in Spanish.

Responsibilities

Receives a standard number of inbound phone calls on active/inactive accounts from NMAC/IFS Customers or Businesses, NMAC/IFS Dealerships, and/or Third Parties (Other Financial institutions, insurance companies, etc.) resolving inquiries, handling complaints, and walking them through the correct process according to their original request. The agent will have to identify the current Account status for appropriate action on both Retail and Lease NMAC/IFS phone calls regarding a Total Loss incident, Vehicle Damage, Titles, End of Term, Interest rate, Post Maturity Date, and other subjectsMaintains a Quality Standard on all phone calls received/made guaranteeing a minimum overall average percentage of 85% following our Call model to assure all Compliance, State, and Federal regulations are within guidelines. Must be able to utilize all tools and resources available to proactively resolve our Customer's concerns and prevent any further callbacks. Must be able to follow all Adherence guidelines to achieve a minimum target of 95%

Requirements

High School Diploma; BA Degree preferredKnowledge of Excellent Customer Service Techniques (Call Center based preferably)Fluent EnglishMS Office Intermediate

Skills

Basic understanding of the auto finance industry. Empathetic with difficult situationsActive ListeningCustomer FocusGood Grammar and Communication Skills Problem-Solving and Negotiation Skills

Schedule:

Availability to work 48 hrs per week

Schedules could fall within the time frame (6:00 am until 9:00 pm) from Monday - Friday and Saturdays from 6:00 am until 5:30 pm

Depending on Department requirements a 6 day or 5 schedule will be assigned for at least 6 months.

title: RPA Developer
description:
General Description: 

The Developer is tasked to deliver automation to drive successful adoption. In addition to building automations, the Developer will also own deliverables across the automation journey to ensure automation use cases and scenarios are properly built and documented. Will be responsible for designing, developing, testing, and implementing automation solutions using RPA tools and new technologies approved by the company.

Key Responsibilities:

Solution Design and automation development: Collaborate with Business Analyst, Solution Architect, and Business Stakeholders to gather automation requirements and translate them into technical specifications. Understands all the stages of an Automation journey and describes the role of the RPA Developer in each stage. Develop and implement process automation solutions using UiPath and new technologies approved by the company. Work closely with Process Leads in understanding the functional requirements, and exceptions and provide solution design & architecture. Support to Testing: Support to Auditor / Tester in performing end-to-end testing in different environments (Development, Staging and Production). Support to Auditor / Tester in conducting thorough testing of automation solutions to ensure they meet quality standards, are error free, and perform reliably in various scenarios. Support to Auditor / Tester in rigorously executing automation testing, including unit testing, user acceptance testing, and bug fixes. Responsible for peer code assessments and knowledge transfer. Support to Auditor / Tester in debugging and troubleshooting automation failures, identifying root causes, and implementing corrective actions. Deployment: Deploy automation solutions into production environments following established process. Collaborate with Support Engineer (If needed) as an escalation point for all technical and architectural issues and assist in problem identification/error resolution process with different technical domains. Documentation: Create comprehensive technical documentation, including process design documents, solution architecture diagrams and deployment guides. Ensure up to date lifecycle automation development within Automation Hub. Document processes and libraries built. Compliance and Security: Ensure that automation solutions comply with regulatory requirements, data privacy laws, and security standards. Adhere to company development and version control standards. Works with Automation Cloud Administrator to provision automation infrastructure, including provisioning of new robots and associating them to different environments. Supports escalation requests regarding Infrastructure/Security by working with relevant teams. Continuous Improvement: Stay informed about emerging trends, best practices, and advancements in automation technologies. 

Education/Certifications:

Bachelor's degree in computer science, Computer Engineering, Mathematics, or related field. UiPath Automation Developer Professional - Desirable

Previous Work Experience

3+ years software development experience. 2-4 years RPA Experience, UiPath preferred. 

Other Knowledge, Skills, And Abilities

Language: Spanish & English intermediate to advanced, Portuguese Desirable. Must have:Familiarization with the Least Privileged Access principle. Understanding of Software Development Lifecycle as used with RPA. Quick technical learner - able to pick up sets of responsibilities quicklyExperience with cross-functional teamsExperience with Agile and Scrum methodologies. Nice to have:Working knowledge of BI tools such as Power BI or TableauExpertise with the UiPath Automation Cloud suiteExperience with cross-regional teamsCompetencies:Focus on results, customer orientation, negotiation and conflict management, effective communication, problem solving, teamwork, planning and organization, work under pressure.
